item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a SUNDAY meetup at Durty Harry's in Charlestown!

We had a great time at Durty Harry's in Brookline on January 20 - now we are going to meet at their Charlestown location!!

Durty Harry's is your one-stop local shop for all things dog related! Self-wash, top-rate grooming, walking services, delicious treats and healthy food (which they will deliver to your door at no extra charge!), in-store events/parties, all the latest fashions, and so much more.

Meetup dues are $3 per Frenchie... If I am not there to collect, please make a mental note of what you owe and hopefully you can pay at a later date or as soon as I set up a way to pay online.

First time visitors please bring: Vaccinations and veterinary paper work on Rabies and DHLP (distemper hepatitis leptorosis parvovirus) are required. Recommended vaccinations are parvo and bordetella. When you come please bring a current list of your dogs vaccinations and your veterinary info (name and phone number).

For more information please visit http://www.durtyharry.com/

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Zeek!

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: February French Bulldog Meetup - part deux!
